   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_sni_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Callback functions
   32: -export([all/0,
   33:          groups/0,
   34:          init_per_suite/1,
   35:          end_per_suite/1,
   36:          init_per_group/2,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          init_per_testcase/2,
   39:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   40: 
   41: %% Testcases
   42: -export([no_sni_ext/1,
   43:          sni_match/1,
   44:          sni_no_match/1,
   45:          no_sni_ext_fun/1,
   46:          sni_match_fun/1,
   47:          sni_no_match_fun/1,
   48:          sni_fail_fun/1,
   49:          sni_crash_fun/1,
   50:          dns_name/1,
   51:          ip_fallback/1,
   52:          no_ip_fallback/1,
   53:          dns_name_reuse/1,
   54:          customize_hostname_check/0,
   55:          customize_hostname_check/1,
   56:          sni_no_trailing_dot/0,
   57:          sni_no_trailing_dot/1,
   58:          hostname_trailing_dot/0,
   59:          hostname_trailing_dot/1
   60:         ]).
   61: 
   62: %% Apply export
   63: -export([send_and_hostname/1,
   64:          recv_and_certificate/1
   65:         ]).
   66: 
   67: -define(TIMEOUT, {seconds, 6}).
   68: 
   69: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   70: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   71: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   72: 
   73: all() ->
   74:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   75:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   76:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
   77:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
   78:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   79:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   80:     ].
   81: 
   82: groups() ->
   83:     [
   84:      {'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   85:      {'tlsv1.2', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   86:      {'tlsv1.1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   87:      {'tlsv1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   88:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   89:      {'dtlsv1', [], [{group, sni_tests}]},
   90:      {sni_tests, [parallel], sni_tests()}
   91:     ].
   92: 
   93: sni_tests() ->
   94:     [no_sni_ext, 
   95:      sni_match, 
   96:      sni_no_match,
   97:      no_sni_ext_fun, 
   98:      sni_match_fun, 
   99:      sni_no_match_fun,
  100:      sni_fail_fun,
  101:      sni_crash_fun,
  102:      dns_name,
  103:      ip_fallback,
  104:      no_ip_fallback,
  105:      dns_name_reuse,
  106:      customize_hostname_check,
  107:      sni_no_trailing_dot,
  108:      hostname_trailing_dot].
  109: 
  110: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  111:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  112:     try application:start(crypto) of
  113:         ok ->
  114:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  115:             Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  116:             {#{server_config := ServerConf,
  117:                client_config := ClientConf},
  118:              #{server_config := LServerConf,
  119:                client_config := LClientConf}} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_sni_configs(),
  120:             %% RSA certs files needed by *dot cases
  121:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert([{client_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]},
  122:                                         {client_local_opts, [{verify, verify_peer} | LClientConf]},
  123:                                         {sni_server_opts, [{sni_hosts, [{Hostname, ServerConf}]} | LServerConf]}
  124:                                        | Config0])
  125:     catch _:_  ->
  126:             {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  127:     end.
  128: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  129:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  130: 
  131: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  132:    ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  133: 
  134: end_per_suite(_) ->
  135:     ssl:stop(),
  136:     application:stop(crypto).
  137: 
  138: init_per_testcase(customize_hostname_check, Config) ->
  139:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  140:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  141:     Config;
  142: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  143:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  144:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  145:     ?CT_LOG("Ciphers: ~p~n ", [ ssl:cipher_suites(default, Version)]),
  146:     ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  147:     Config.
  148: 
  149: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  154: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  155: no_sni_ext(Config) ->
  156:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  157:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  158:     ClientOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  159:                                               proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  160:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  161: 
  162: no_sni_ext_fun(Config) ->
  163:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  164:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  165:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, []) end,
  166:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  167:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, disable} |
  168:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  169:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, undefined).
  170: 
  171: sni_match(Config) ->
  172:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  173:     ServerOptions = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config), Config),
  174:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  175:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  176:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  177: 
  178: sni_match_fun(Config) ->
  179:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  180:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  181:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, unrecognized) end,
  182:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  183:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  184:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  185:     basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, HostName).
  186: 
  187: sni_no_match(Config) ->
  188:    {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  189:     [_ | DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  190:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  191:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  192:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config),
  193:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  194: 
  195: sni_no_match_fun(Config) ->
  196:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  197:     [{sni_hosts, ServerSNIConf}| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  198:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> proplists:get_value(Domain, ServerSNIConf, unrecognized) end,
  199:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  200:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, "localhost"} |
  201:                                                proplists:get_value(client_local_opts, Config)], Config),
  202:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, unrecognized_name).
  203: 
  204: sni_fail_fun(Config) ->
  205:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  206:     [_| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  207:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ,
  208:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  209:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  210:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions ++ [{sni_fun, fun(_Domain) -> [{versions, ['tlsv1.5']}] end}],
  211:                          ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure),
  212:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions ++  [{sni_fun, fun(_Domain) -> [{verify, foobar}] end}],
  213:                          ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  214: 
  215: sni_crash_fun(Config) ->
  216:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, HostName} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  217:     [_| DefaultConf] = proplists:get_value(sni_server_opts, Config),
  218:     SNIFun = fun(Domain) -> Domain = nomatch end,
  219:     ServerOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(DefaultConf, Config) ++ [{sni_fun, SNIFun}],
  220:     ClientOptions =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{server_name_indication, HostName} |
  221:                                                proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config)], Config),
  222:     basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, handshake_failure).
  223: 
  224: 
  225: 
  226: dns_name(Config) ->
  227:     Hostname = "OTP.test.server",
  228:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  229:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  230:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  231:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  232:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  233:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  234:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  235:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  236:                                                                                critical = false}]},
  237:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  238:                                     client_chain =>
  239:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  240:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  241:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  242:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  243:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  244:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  245:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  246: 
  247:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  248:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer},
  249:                                     {server_name_indication, Hostname} | ClientConf], undefined, Config),
  250:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, "foo"} | ClientConf],
  251:                           undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  252:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer}, {server_name_indication, disable} | ClientConf],
  253:                         undefined, Config).
  254: 
  255: ip_fallback(Config) ->
  256:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  257:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  258:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  259:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  260:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  261:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  262:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  263:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  264:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  265:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  266:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  267:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname},
  268:                                                                                            {iPAddress, IPList}],
  269:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  270:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}]},
  271:                                     client_chain =>
  272:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  273:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  274:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  275: 
  276:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  277:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  278:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  279:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  280: 
  281:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  282:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config),
  283:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config),
  284:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], list_to_atom(Hostname), Config).
  285: 
  286: no_ip_fallback(Config) ->
  287:     Hostname = net_adm:localhost(),
  288:     {ok, #hostent{h_addr_list = [IP |_]}} = inet:gethostbyname(net_adm:localhost()),
  289:     IPList = tuple_to_list(IP),
  290:     IPStr  = lists:flatten(integer_to_list(hd(IPList)) ++ [io_lib:format(".~w", [I]) || I <- tl(IPList)]),
  291:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  292:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  293:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  294:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  295:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  296:                                           peer => [{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID =
  297:                                                                                   ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  298:                                                                               extnValue = [{dNSName, Hostname}],
  299:                                                                               critical = false}]},
  300:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  301:                                                   ]},
  302:                                     client_chain =>
  303:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  304:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  305:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  306: 
  307:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  308:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  309:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  310:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  311: 
  312:     successful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], Hostname, Config),
  313:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IP, Config, handshake_failure),
  314:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], IPStr, Config, handshake_failure).
  315: 
  316: dns_name_reuse(Config) ->
  317:     SNIHostname = "OTP.test.server",
  318:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  319:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
  320:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain =>
  321:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
  322:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
  323:                                           peer => [{extensions,  [#'Extension'{extnID =
  324:                                                                                    ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  325:                                                                                extnValue = [{dNSName, SNIHostname}],
  326:                                                                                critical = false}
  327:                                                                  ]},
  328:                                                    {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}
  329:                                                   ]},
  330:                                     client_chain =>
  331:                                         #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}],
  332:                                           intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]],
  333:                                           peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}]}}),
  334: 
  335:     Opts = proplists:get_value(group_opts, Config),
  336:     VersionTuple = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  337:     ServerConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ServerOpts0,
  338:     ClientConf = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, VersionTuple) ++ Opts ++ ClientOpts0,
  339: 
  340:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  341: 
  342:     unsuccessful_connect(ServerConf, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf], undefined, Config, handshake_failure),
  343: 
  344:     Server =
  345: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  346: 				   {from, self()},
  347: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  348: 				   {options, ServerConf}]),
  349:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  350:     Client0 =
  351: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  352:                                    {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  353: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  354:                                    {from, self()}, {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  355:                                                               {server_name_indication, SNIHostname} | ClientConf]}]),
  356:     receive
  357:         {Server, _} ->
  358:             ok
  359:     end,
  360: 
  361:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  362: 
  363:     %% Make sure session is registered
  364:     ct:sleep(1000),
  365: 
  366:     Client1 =
  367: 	ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  368:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  369:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, session_info_result, []}},
  370:                                          {from, self()},  {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientConf]}]),
  371: 
  372:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, handshake_failure),
  373:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0).
  374: 
  375: 
  376: customize_hostname_check() ->
  377:     [{doc,"Test option customize_hostname_check."}].
  378: customize_hostname_check(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  379:     Ext = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-subjectAltName',
  380:                         extnValue = [{dNSName, "*.example.org"}],
  381:                         critical = false}
  382:           ],
  383:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
  384:       client_config := ClientOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_pem(rsa, [{server_chain,
  385:                                                                                [[], 
  386:                                                                                 [],
  387:                                                                                 [{extensions, Ext}]
  388:                                                                                ]}], 
  389:                                                                         Config, "https_hostname_convention"),
  390:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ClientOpts0, Config),
  391:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(ServerOpts0, Config),  
  392:                                         
  393:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  394:   
  395:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0}, 
  396:                                         {host, Hostname},
  397: 					{from, self()}, 
  398: 					{mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  399: 					{options, ServerOpts}]),
  400:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  401:     
  402:     CustomFun = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https),
  403:     
  404:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  405:                                         {host, Hostname},
  406: 					 {from, self()}, 
  407:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  408:                                         {options,
  409:                                          [{verify, verify_peer},
  410:                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"},
  411:                                           {customize_hostname_check, 
  412:                                            [{match_fun, CustomFun}]} | ClientOpts]
  413: 					 }]),    
  414:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  415:     
  416:     Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}}},
  417:                                         
  418:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port}, 
  419:                                                {host, Hostname},
  420:                                                {from, self()}, 
  421:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  422:                                                {options, [{verify, verify_peer},
  423:                                                           {server_name_indication, "other.example.org"} | ClientOpts]}
  424:                                               ]),    
  425:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client1, handshake_failure).
  426: 
  427: sni_no_trailing_dot() ->
  428:       [{doc,"Test that sni may not include a triling dot"}].
  429: sni_no_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  430:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  431:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  432: 
  433:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  434: 
  435:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  436:                                  {from, self()},
  437:                                  {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  438:                                  {options, [ServerOpts]}]),
  439: 
  440:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  441: 
  442:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  443: 					      {host, Hostname},
  444: 					      {from, self()},
  445:                                               {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  446: 					      {options,
  447:                                                [{server_name_indication, Hostname ++ "."} | ClientOpts]}]),
  448:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unrecognized_name).
  449: 
  450: hostname_trailing_dot() ->
  451:     [{doc,"Test that fallback sni removes trailing dot of hostname"}].
  452: 
  453: hostname_trailing_dot(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  454:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_opts, Config),
  455:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(sni_server_opts, Config),
  456:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname0} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  457: 
  458:     case trailing_dot_hostname(Hostname0) of
  459:         {ok, Hostname} ->
  460:             Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  461:                                                 {from, self()},
  462:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  463:                                                 {options, ServerOpts}]),
  464:             Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  465:             Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ServerNode}, {port, Port},
  466:                                                 {host, Hostname},
  467:                                                 {from, self()},
  468:                                                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  469:                                         {options, ClientOpts}]),
  470: 
  471:             ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  472: 
  473:             ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  474:             ssl_test_lib:close(Client);
  475:         {skip, _ } = Skip ->
  476:             Skip
  477:     end.
  478: 
  479: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  480: %% Callback Functions ------------------------------------------------
  481: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  482: send_and_hostname(SSLSocket) ->
  483:     ssl:send(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  484:     case  ssl:connection_information(SSLSocket, [sni_hostname]) of
  485: 	{ok, [{sni_hostname, Hostname}]} ->
  486: 	    Hostname;
  487: 	{ok, []} ->
  488: 	    undefined
  489:     end.
  490: 
  491: recv_and_certificate(SSLSocket) ->
  492:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "OK"),
  493:     {ok, PeerCert} = ssl:peercert(SSLSocket),
  494:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = {rdnSequence, Subject}}} 
  495: 	= public_key:pkix_decode_cert(PeerCert, otp),
  496:     ?CT_LOG("Subject of certificate received from server: ~p", [Subject]),
  497:     rdn_to_string(rdnPart(Subject, ?'id-at-commonName')).
  498: 
  499: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  500: %% Internal Functions ------------------------------------------------
  501: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  502: basic_sni_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Expected) ->
  503:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  504:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {?MODULE, send_and_hostname, []}},
  505:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  506:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  507:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  508:                                         {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  509:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, recv_and_certificate, []}},
  510:                                         {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  511:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Expected, Client,  "server Peer cert"),
  512:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  513:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  514: 
  515: basic_sni_alert_test(ServerNode, ServerOptions, ClientNode, ClientOptions, HostName, Alert) ->
  516:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  517:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  518:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  519:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  520:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  521:                                               {host, HostName}, {from, self()},
  522:                                               {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOptions]}]),
  523:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client, Alert),
  524:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  525:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  526: 
  527: successful_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config) ->
  528:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  529:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  530:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  531:                                         {from, self()}, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  532:                                         {options, ServerOptions}]),
  533:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  534:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  535:                                         {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  536:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  537:                                         {options, ClientOptions}]),
  538:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  539:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  540:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  541: 
  542: unsuccessful_connect(ServerOptions, ClientOptions, Hostname0, Config, Alert) ->
  543:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname1} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  544:     Hostname = host_name(Hostname0, Hostname1),
  545:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  546: 					      {from, self()},
  547: 					      {options, ServerOptions}]),
  548:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  549:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  550: 					      {host, Hostname},
  551: 					      {from, self()}, 
  552: 					      {options, ClientOptions}]),
  553:     
  554:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, Alert).
  555: 
  556: host_name(undefined, Hostname) ->
  557:     Hostname;
  558: host_name(Hostname, _) ->
  559:     Hostname.
  560: 
  561: trailing_dot_hostname(HostName) ->
  562:     case lists:member($., HostName) of
  563:         true ->
  564:             case lists:last(HostName) =/= $. of
  565:                 true ->
  566:                     {ok, HostName ++ "."};
  567:                 false ->
  568:                     {ok, HostName}
  569:             end;
  570:         _ ->
  571:             {skip, "Trailing dot conf not possible"}
  572:      end.
  573: 
  574: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, Expect) ->
  575:     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, "", Expect).
  576: 
  577: ssl_recv(SSLSocket, CurrentData, ExpectedData) ->
  578:     receive
  579:         {ssl, SSLSocket, Data} ->
  580:             NeweData = CurrentData ++ Data,
  581:             case NeweData of
  582:                 ExpectedData ->
  583:                     ok;
  584:                 _  ->
  585:                     ssl_recv(SSLSocket, NeweData, ExpectedData)
  586:             end;
  587:         Other ->
  588:             ct:fail({unexpected_message, Other})
  589:     after 4000 ->
  590:             ct:fail({timeout, CurrentData, ExpectedData})
  591:     end.
  592: 
  593: rdnPart([[#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type=Type, value=Value} | _] | _], Type) ->
  594:     Value;
  595: rdnPart([_ | Tail], Type) ->
  596:     rdnPart(Tail, Type);
  597: rdnPart([], _) ->
  598:     unknown.
  599: 
  600: rdn_to_string({utf8String, Binary}) ->
  601:     erlang:binary_to_list(Binary);
  602: rdn_to_string({printableString, String}) ->
  603:     String.
